pages.title: Roughly Enough Items
pages.text: To find new blocks and discover new content you can use Roughly Enough Items (REI). $(br)With REI you can search every item incuded in Blue Lotus Modpack. You can $(#1A5FB4)left click$() to see how to craft the item and $(#A51D2D)right click$() to show  what you can craft from it. You can find REI at the left side of the inventory screen.
